show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #00 Clay Conry "Podcasting 101"
subtitle: #00 Clay Conry "Podcasting 101"
summary:
Ranching Reboot: Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers.

In our kick-off episode, the team sits down with Clay Conry from Working Cows Podcast to discuss the launch of Ranching Reboot, and learn more about Clay's operations.
